title: Podcast Extra: Heterotaxy and Hearts
description: After hearing our episode about hearts, 3yo Ethan Chandra, from Middlesex, NJ, wanted to share the story of his own heart. In this podcast extra, Ethan and his 5yo sister Zoe and their mother, Ali, talk about what it's been like for Ethan to live with a condition called heterotaxy.
itunes:subtitle: After hearing our episode about hearts, 3yo Ethan Chandra, from Middlesex, NJ, wanted to share the story of his own heart.
author: questions@butwhykids.org (Vermont Public)
itunes:author: Vermont Public Radio
